formatDescription: Yamaha Wave Audio signature describes formats relevant to Yamaha Wave files, these formats are proprietary and created by Yamaha. There are several versions of these file formats with a numerous examples of extensions. This entry describes generic Yamaha wave format, and PRONOM holds a separate entry on Yamaha TX Wave Audio. Please contact the PRONOM team if you have more information regarding Yamaha Wave formats.
